enormity n. 极恶；暴行execrable adj. 极坏的foul adj. 邪恶的；恶臭的；v. 弄脏；n. （体育等）犯规.
《GMAT600分词汇》第五课 ... exculpate v.开脱，使无罪 execrable a.该诅咒的，可恶的 exhort v.规劝，告诫.

list.abs: telerobot system can be widely used in altitude exploration , deep-ocean exploitation , remote task or dangerous and execrable task environment .遥机器人系统可广泛应用于高空探索、深海开发、远程作业或者是人类难以到达的危险、恶劣的作业环境中。
others execrate it , like Beccaria ., 有些人痛恨它 , 如贝卡里亚.
abominable treatment of prisoners ; detestable vices ; execrable crimes ; consequences odious to those you govern - Edmund Burke ., 对犯人进行令人发指的虐待 ; 令人憎恶的恶行 ; 可憎的罪行 ; 你统治的结果是令人憎恶的.
An execrable place in the winter , Paris !, 冬天的巴黎真是一个可恶的地方!

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'expressing or involving a curse'): via Old French from Latin execrabilis, from exsecrari 'to curse' (see execrate)

entry.tran: 令人讨厌的;可恶的;非常糟糕的
entry.def: If you describe something as execrable, you mean that it is very bad or unpleasant.

example.ex: Accusing us of being disloyal to cover his own sorry behavior is truly execrable.
example.tran: 他指责我们不忠诚以掩盖他自己的错误行为，真令人厌恶。

means.word_mean: 1. of very poor quality or condition;

sentences.sentence: "deplorable housing conditions in the inner city"
"consequences odious to those you govern"- Edmund Burke

auth_sentence.content: The others who were wounded in the execrable attack on the synagogue.
auth_sentence.res_content: The others who were wounded in the execrable attack on the synagogue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The others who were wounded in the execrable attack on the synagogue.

auth_sentence.content: Nuclear power, I'm afraid is going to be essential despite our execrable performance re by-products.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nuclear power, I'm afraid is going to be essential despite our execrable performance re by-products.

sentences.en: Convenience is , however , in all affairs of life， an execrable test of value.
sentences.cn: 然而在生活事务的各方面，利益是可恶的价值准则。
